trans-unit.source: Adds a form for newsletter subscription.
trans-unit.target: Dodaje formu za pretplatu na bilten.

trans-unit.source: This text will be displayed beneath the newsletter subscribe button.
trans-unit.target: Ovaj tekst će biti prikazan ispod biltena dugmeta za pretplatu.

trans-unit.source: Customers can subscribe to your newsletter when registering, or by entering their email in the newsletter form.
trans-unit.target: Kupci se mogu pretplatiti na vaš bilten pri registraciji, ili unosom svoje e-mail adrese u bilten formi.

trans-unit.source: Partner offers subscribers have agreed to receive your partners' offers.
trans-unit.target: Pretplatnici na partnerske ponude se slažu s primanjem Vaših ponuda.
Osobe koje nisu pretplatnici na partnerske ponude

trans-unit.source: Newsletter subscription: no email to delete, this customer has not registered.
trans-unit.target: Pretplata za bilten: nema e-poruke za brisanje, ovaj klijent nije registrovan.

trans-unit.source: Newsletter subscription: no email to export, this customer has not registered.
trans-unit.target: Pretplata za bilten: nema e-poruke za izvoz, ovaj klijent nije registrovan.
